title: 'The Challenge: USA’ Episode 2 | Surviving the Challenge
description:
Tyson Apostol and Amelia Wedemeyer are back to talk about Episode 2 of ‘The Challenge: USA.' First, they talk about the “Yeah Buoy” challenge and Tyson’s strategy going into it (10:49). Later, they get into the elimination challenge and how the results will impact the game going forward (28:09).

Hosts: Tyson Apostol and Amelia Wedemeyer
Associate Producer: Carlos Chiriboga
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
